headline: Otis Announces 8 Percent Increase in Quarterly Dividend to $0.42 per Share
summary: The Otis Worldwide Corporation (NYSE: OTIS) Board of Directors today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.42 per share of Otis' common stock, representing an 8% increase. The dividend will be payable on June 6, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 16, 2025.

headline: Otis Worldwide to Report Q1 Earnings: What to Expect From the Stock?
summary: OTIS' first-quarter performance is likely to have been impacted by lower New Equipment sales, with maintenance portfolio growth benefiting the results.
